SEARCH
Package com.peaslimited.shoppeas.repository

Interface OrderHistoryRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
OrderHistoryRepositoryImpl
public interface OrderHistoryRepository
OrderHistoryRepository is an interface for managing order history data, including retrieving and adding order history records.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addOrderHistory(String uid, ArrayList<Object> cartList)
    Adds a new order history entry for a user based on their UID.
    List<OrderHistoryDTO>
    getOrderHistoryByUID(String uid)
    Retrieves the order history for a specific user based on their UID.

  • Method Details

    • getOrderHistoryByUID

      List<OrderHistoryDTO> getOrderHistoryByUID(String uid) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Retrieves the order history for a specific user based on their UID.
      Parameters:
      uid - the unique identifier of the user
      Returns:
      a List of OrderHistoryDTO objects containing the user's order history
      Throws:
      ExecutionException
      InterruptedException

    • addOrderHistory

      void addOrderHistory(String uid, ArrayList<Object> cartList) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException, IOException, URISyntaxException
      Adds a new order history entry for a user based on their UID.
      Parameters:
      uid - the unique identifier of the user
      cartList - an ArrayList containing the items from the user's cart to be added to order history
      Throws:
      ExecutionException
      InterruptedException
      IOException
      URISyntaxException
